sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine launches an investigation after a mid-air collision kills three airmen, including a celebrated fighter pilot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Strong winds and heavy rain in southern Europe cause flooding and disruption and bring to an end the summer's searing heat wave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian authorities have launched an investigation after a mid-air collision between two warplanes in the west of the country killed three of its airmen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One of them was celebrated fighter pilot Andriy Jus Pilchikov, seen here on the right, famous for taking part in dogfights over Kyiv during the early phase of Russia's invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On the battlefront, while the Ukrainian army says it's continuing to advance after breaking through the Russian defense line in the Zaporizhia region, Russia says its forces launched a strike against an airfield in the Kiev region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Ukrainian government has confirmed the safe passage of a second vessel through the Black Sea from Ukraine to death support after Russia's withdrawal last month from a UN broker deal allowing the export of grain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The announcement comes despite warnings from Russia that such vessels may be considered military targets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And in Moscow, floral tributes have been laid to the head of the Wagner mercenary group, Yevgeny Prigozhin, after his death was finally confirmed following last week's plane crash.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Russia's investigation committee have said genetic tests have confirmed the identities of the 10 people who died, including that of Prigozhin, although no details of what caused the crash have been offered. Ukrajina je z lidské a z jenenské produkce tak významná, že ty dopady toho přerušení těch dod minového pole je symbol, ale my bychom rádi, aby veřejnost převáděla symboly v činy a proto je samozřejmě důležité nejenom upec ten chleba, ale také přispět na odminovací stroje.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Dokáže za jednu hodinu vytvořit 4 kilometry průchodu minovým polem nebo zaminovaným území o 6,8 metru.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Minovací systém Božena, který pomáhá ochránit život nevinným lidem, stojí přes 15 milionů korun, tedy asi 625 tisíc eur.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Většina z této částky už byla vybrána.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Na Ukrajině by podobných ale bylo potřeba minimálně tisíc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Jiří Skáncel, Euronews, Ostrava. Madre mía, a fin llueve por cañón. Kjell Krona, Kjell Andersen, FN. Prosecutors have opened an inquiry into two explosions at an unlicensed, loquified petroleum gas filling station that left two people dead and 56 people injured north of Romania's capital, Bucharest, over the weekend. The destruction was widespread. Some of the injured were firefighters who rushed to the station in the Crevidea commune to extinguish the blaze caused by the first explosion before the second occurred later on Saturday. Several people are in critical condition with severe burns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Authorities temporarily evacuated residents within a radius of 700 meters of the fire that started while gas was transferred from one tanker to another. As hundreds of people queued to give blood, Romania's president described the explosions as a tragedy and said he was profoundly saddened by what had happened.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: France's education minister, Gabriel Attal, has announced his country is set to ban young girls from wearing the abaya in state-run schools. The abaya is a loose-fitting, full-length robe worn by some Muslim women. France enforces a strict ban on religious signs in state schools, including the wearing of large crosses and Islamic headscarves. The move comes after months of debate and is likely to anger many in France's 5 million strong Muslim community. The right has been pushing for the ban, but the left argues it will encroach on civil liberties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Millions of revelers gathered in London on Sunday to celebrate its annual Notting Hill Carnival. The two-day event is a

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: celebration of Caribbean culture. Originating in the Notting Hill riots in response to racial inequalities, the festival now attracts a diverse crowd of families and music lovers. This year also marks the 75th anniversary of the docking of the Windrush liner, which brought migrants from the West Indies to the UK for post-World War II employment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people in Washington, D.C. have commemorated 60 years since Martin Luther King Jr.'s famous I Have a Dream speech.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: His family and activists addressed the crowds to highlight the importance of the speech and how it resonates today.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The weekend's gathering was a precursor to the actual anniversary of the August 28, 1963 March on Washington.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris will meet the organizers of the 1963 March on Washington. U.S. President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris will meet the organizers of the 1963 March on Monday. All of King's children have also been invited.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Simone Biles, who has won the most medals in U.S. gymnastics history, took her record-breaking eighth national title in San Jose, California on Sunday. Her victory smashed a previous record that has stood since 1933.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This comes after Biles took a two-year hiatus from gymnastics to focus on her health and become one of the most respected voices in the defense of athletes' rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Her performance in San Jose took the four-time Olympic champion one step closer to returning to the Games in Paris 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Archaeologists in Serbia are hard at work excavating the Viminacium site near the town

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: of Kostolek, where local coal miners found the remains of an ancient Roman ship earlier this month. Brushing the soil and sand off the wood, they unearth the planks of a preserved riverboat, some 13 meters long and 3.5 meters wide.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Located at the Drumno mine, 95 kilometers east of Belgrade, researchers are rushing to preserve what is left of the vessel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It is very difficult to find organic material in our area, especially when it is not in water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We were lucky to find a completely preserved water tank at a depth of 7 meters on the surface of the water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The water tank was not found intact, of course, it was heavily damaged, but the wood is in good condition, so it looks great, really.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The ship has been transferred to the nearby archaeological center where further research continues. ukoliko se osuši, ono se raspadne. Tako da mi na ovaj način čuvamo u stvari dravo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ovo je najljepša odgova, koja je bila čuvana u riječi, koja je jedan od vrata, koja je učinila vijest Viminasiju.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Svijetljivih vesela su bila odgova u vijestu i su bila čuvana uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Eksporti kažu da je vojna možda došla u površinu 3. ili 4. godina, ali stvarno se uvijek uvijek uvijek uvijek. as the third or fourth century AD, but are still investigating. The specimens were sent last week to a laboratory in Hungary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We expect to get results in two to two and a half months, and then there will be no more doubt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: To fund the dig, archaeologists are hoping to secure financial support from the Serbian government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They aim to showcase their discoveries in a museum close to their research center in Kostolak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Archaeologists have been working at Viminacium since 1882, and researchers estimate that just 5% of the 450-hectare site has so far been excavated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Created in 1958 in honor of its Franco-Romanian namesake, the Georgia NSQ Festival has since transformed into what is considered one of the major meeting places for musicians and music lovers from all over the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Dozens of concerts and competitions for young musicians will now take place in the Romanian capital Bucharest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Georgia NSQ Philharmonic Orchestra got the ball rolling with conductor Christian Muchalaru and Kutier Capuçon, one of the greatest cello virtuosos. Ils ont noté le concert en B minor, opus 104, par Dvorak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: ... Le festival Georges Enescu est devenu au fil des ans un rendez-vous incontournable sur la carte européenne et mondiale des grands festivals de musique classique.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Une reconnaissance internationale pour la Roumanie qui va accueillir jusqu'à fin septembre les plus grands solistes et orchestres du monde.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A Bucarest, Frédéric Ponsard pour Euronews.
